title: Buying any baseball related trade cards
author: Sean1125

posts.post_title: Buying any baseball related trade cards
posts.post_content:
Looking for bulk groupings of late 1800's baseball related trade cards. Any year is fine as long as it is baseball related. I am avoiding snipped corners, paper loss, and other technical issues.

Please contact if you have any available.

Thanks,

Sean
I am always buying! Highest prices paid.
